languages.text: This creature deals more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies but suffers 3 {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} every time it deals damage. Its attacks gain a chance to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the target or inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This creature deals more damage to enemies but suffers 3 piercing damage every time it deals damage. Its attacks gain a chance to push the target or inflict bleeding.

This creature deals more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies but suffers 3 {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} every time it deals damage. Its attacks gain a chance to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the target or inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

This creature deals more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies but suffers 3 {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} every time it deals damage. Its attacks gain a chance to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the target or inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

languages.text: Существо наносит больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} противникам, но при каждом нанесении урона само получает 3 {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}пронзающего урона{/g}. С некоторым шансом его атаки могут {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}оттолкнуть{/g} цель или наложить {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature deals more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies but suffers 3 {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} every time it deals damage. Its attacks gain a chance to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the target or inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Существо наносит больше урона противникам, но при каждом нанесении урона само получает 3 пронзающего урона. С некоторым шансом его атаки могут оттолкнуть цель или наложить кровотечение.
Существо наносит больше урона противникам, но при каждом нанесении урона само получает 3 пронзающего урона. С некоторым шансом его атаки могут оттолкнуть цель или наложить кровотечение.

languages.text: 此生物会对敌人造成更高{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，但每次造成伤害时，自身都会受到3点{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}穿刺伤害{/g}。它的攻击有一定几率{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}目标，或使目标{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}。
languages.original_text: This creature deals more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies but suffers 3 {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} every time it deals damage. Its attacks gain a chance to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the target or inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物会对敌人造成更高伤害，但每次造成伤害时，自身都会受到3点穿刺伤害。它的攻击有一定几率推开目标，或使目标流血。

languages.text: 生き物は敵に対してより{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えるが、ダメージを与えるごとに3の{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}貫通ダメージ{/g}を受ける。攻撃はターゲットを{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}プッシュ{/g}したり、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}させたりするチャンスを得る。
languages.original_text: This creature deals more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies but suffers 3 {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} every time it deals damage. Its attacks gain a chance to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the target or inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物は敵に対してよりダメージを与えるが、ダメージを与えるごとに3の貫通ダメージを受ける。攻撃はターゲットをプッシュしたり、出血させたりするチャンスを得る。

languages.text: Esta criatura inflige más {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} pero sufre 3 puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}daño perforante{/g} cada vez que inflige daño. Sus ataques ganan una probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empujar{/g} al enemigo o infligir {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature deals more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies but suffers 3 {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} every time it deals damage. Its attacks gain a chance to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the target or inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura inflige más daño pero sufre 3 puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}daño perforante{/g} cada vez que inflige daño. Sus ataques ganan una probabilidad de empujar al enemigo o infligir {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}.

languages.text: Diese Kreatur fügt Gegnern mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu, erleidet dabei aber jedes Mal 3 {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Durchdringungsschaden{/g}. Ihre Angriffe haben die Chance, das Ziel zu {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}stoßen{/g} oder es mit {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} zu belegen.
languages.original_text: This creature deals more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies but suffers 3 {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} every time it deals damage. Its attacks gain a chance to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the target or inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur fügt Gegnern mehr Schaden zu, erleidet dabei aber jedes Mal 3 Durchdringungsschaden. Ihre Angriffe haben die Chance, das Ziel zu stoßen oder ihm Bluten zu verursachen.

languages.text: Cette créature inflige plus de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} aux ennemis, mais subit 3 {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}dégâts perforants{/g} chaque fois qu'elle inflige des dégâts. Par ailleurs, ses attaques ont une chance de {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repousser{/g} la cible ou de lui faire subir l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature deals more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies but suffers 3 {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} every time it deals damage. Its attacks gain a chance to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the target or inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature inflige plus de dégâts aux ennemis mais subit 3 dégâts perçants chaque fois qu'elle inflige des dégâts. Par ailleurs, ses attaques ont une chance de repousser la cible ou de lui infliger l'effet Saignement.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, düşmanlara daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir ancak her hasar verdiğinde de 3 {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}delme hasarı{/g} alır. Saldırıları, hedefi {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}itme{/g} veya hedefte {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} oluşturma olasılığı kazanır.
languages.original_text: This creature deals more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies but suffers 3 {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} every time it deals damage. Its attacks gain a chance to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the target or inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.
